document.full_text: eleven people stormed into a house in a central indian village and assaulted a woman whom they accused of witchcraft, blinding her and her husband by stabbing them in the eyes with scissors, police said on saturday.
document.title: gang blinds indian woman, accused of witchcraft, with scissors
lines_and_colors: eleven people stormed into a house in a central indian village and assaulted a woman whom they accused of witchcraft, blinding her and her husband by stabbing them in the eyes with scissors, police said on saturday.
